entry.title: Saturday: A mix of sun and cloud. High minus 1.
entry.summary: Increasing cloudiness this morning. Wind southwest 20 km/h becoming northwest 20 near noon. High minus 1. Wind chill minus 17 this morning and minus 7 this afternoon. UV index 1 or low. Forecast issued 05:00 AM CST Saturday 18 February 2023

entry.title: Saturday night: Periods of light snow. Low minus 10.
entry.summary: Becoming cloudy this evening then periods of light snow. Wind northwest 20 km/h becoming light this evening. Low minus 10. Wind chill minus 8 this evening and minus 13 overnight. Forecast issued 05:00 AM CST Saturday 18 February 2023
